column4: Seed in dark soil; sensing world through vibrations.
First spark of a rising fire; turning hunches to habits.
Steady hammer on the anvil; rhythm in repetition.
Artisan perfecting the blueprint; machine heartbeat.
Lighthouse in the storm; brilliant light on hidden logic.
Sage from the mountain; truth demanding to be shared.
Shadow at twilight; reputation is its own gravity.
Dream-walker in the thinning mist; between seen and felt.
